subs.text: How to create a list in the Chat tab on Scripting News.
Just re-watched last night's Game of Thrones. It's even better when you know what's coming.
My AppleTV says itâ€™s been deactivated. What?

If I were the CEO of a news org I would change priority from collecting members to collecting sources. Develop relations with sources the same way PR firms develop relations with reporters. You want lots of direct connects. And want the sources to value a relationship with you. That means providing lots of benefits for sources. Think creatively about that. What do sources want most. Not talking about money.
Doing more work on the Chat tab today.
